code: import moment from"moment";import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{MONTHS_ARR}from'../constants/months.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var LinkChart=function LinkChart(_ref){var link=_ref.link;var months=link.clicksDate.map(function(mon){return moment(mon).format("MMM");});var clickCountByMonth=MONTHS_ARR.map(function(month){return months.filter(function(m){return m===month;}).length;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:'500px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mt-3",children:"Click Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"line",data:{labels:MONTHS_ARR,datasets:[{label:'clicks',data:clickCountByMonth,backgroundColor:'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)',borderColor:'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)',borderWidth:3}]},options:{maintainAspectRatio:false,responsive:true,scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true}}}})]});};export default LinkChart;
